message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer is fair considering the depreciation.
I understand about the depreciation, but I think this split is more reflective of the situation.
Bob, this is a serious offer. The longer we wait, the less we both get. Let's be practical.
Alice, we're getting close.  I need you to meet me a bit closer to the middle ground though.
Bob, this is the best offer you'll get.  Take it or leave it - we're running out of time!
Alice, this is my final offer.  We both lose if you reject.
